job.title: Data Engineer (REMOTE)
job.description:
Job Summary: 

This technology role will report to the AVP of Data Architecture. 

 

Job Duties 

  • Work as part of a data engineering team building Allied World’s cloud-based data platform 
  • Build the cloud infrastructure required for optimal extraction, transformation, and loading of data from a wide variety of data sources 
  • Assemble large, complex data sets that meet functional / non-functional business requirements 
  • Identify, design, and implement internal process improvements: automating manual processes, optimizing data delivery, re-designing infrastructure for greater scalability, etc 
  • Keep our data separated and secure across national boundaries through multiple data centers and AWS regions 
  • Work with data and analytics team to strive for greater functionality in our data platform 
  • Help build and maintain a metrics-driven DevOps culture with a focus on automation and observability
